question: Indiaâ€™s first Agri-commodity Options Contracts trading has been launched for which of the following products?
explanation: Recently, the government launched options trading in guarseed on the commodity bourse NCDEX. NCDEX is the second exchange after MCX to launch options trading in commodities. In October 2017, MCX had launched gold options. Guarseed is the first agri-commodity options.
